items.sentence: We haven\'t seen much of Tom since Mary committed suicide.
We\'ve got to talk to Tom before he does something stupid.
You could buy all of those things if you really want them.
You have no idea where Tom plans to go to college, do you?
You may go to the party, but you must be home by midnight.
You might want to sit down. This is going to take a while.
You were too busy having fun to notice what was happening.
My mother has a driver\'s license, but she doesn\'t drive.
Is that the man whose wife was killed in the car accident?
Tom has already accomplished what he wanted to accomplish.
Tom is a pretty good singer, but he never sings at church.
Tom is in the living room watching cartoons with the kids.
Tom looked at me as if I were speaking a foreign language.
Tom loves the new toy that Mary gave him for his birthday.
What\'s in the beach bag that\'s in the trunk of your car?
I wonder whether or not Tom knows how poor Mary really is.
Tom is always acting like he\'s better than everyone else.
She wasn\'t wealthy enough to feed her dog meat every day.
I was able to finish the work earlier than I had expected.
Tom wished that he\'d put more money into that investment.
What\'s the difference between a hedgehog and a porcupine?
Why didn\'t you tell me that you were allergic to peanuts?
I\'m looking for Tom. You don\'t know where he is, do you?
I\'m not sure if I\'m going to be able to be of much help.
Are you honestly telling me you never want to get married?
How long has it been since you received a letter from him?
I think we need to find out who Tom plans to give that to.
This application runs on Tom\'s phone, but not on Mary\'s.
Was this wall built to keep people out or to keep them in?
We have to do something to stop this from happening again.
Tom asked me why I never tried to get a driver\'s license.
Tom broke into Mary\'s house and stole her pearl necklace.
Tom and Mary fell head over heels in love with each other.
Tom and Mary have been happily married for thirteen years.
Tom and Mary split up after being married for three years.
I thought I\'d drop in to see you before I went to Boston.
I understand your point of view, but don\'t agree with it.
I wouldn\'t want to do anything that would make Tom angry.
Although there\'s little chance of success, let\'s try it.
Don\'t hesitate to ask questions if you don\'t understand.
Tom is not violent and he never picks fights with anybody.
I should\'ve told Tom that that was the reason I did that.
I shouldn\'t have used the word "password" as my password.
I speak French a little, but I\'m not yet very good at it.
I still don\'t understand exactly what Tom wants us to do.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to tell him how to run his business.
Tom doesn\'t get along with his neighbors like he used to.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between a wolf and a fox.
Tom doesn\'t know why Mary was in a bad mood this morning.
In Singapore, one way to punish criminals is to whip them.
